tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE compliance_records ( record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, record_name VARCHAR(255), regulation_name VARCHAR(255), compliance_status BOOLEAN );

CREATE TABLE documentation ( doc_id INT PRIMARY KEY, document_name VARCHAR(255), document_type VARCHAR(50), document_link VARCHAR(255), record_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES compliance_records(record_id) );

CREATE TABLE regulations (
  regulation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  enactment_date DATE,
  compliance_deadline DATE
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    record_date DATE,
    regulatory_body VARCHAR(50),
    record_type VARCHAR(50),
    record_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE audits (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_date DATE,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(100),
    audit_result VARCHAR(50),
    comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    record_date DATE,
    record_type VARCHAR(50),
    regulation_code VARCHAR(20),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    action VARCHAR(50),
    details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE regulations (
    regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_title VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    effective_date DATE,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    report_type VARCHAR(50),
    summary TEXT,
    reviewer VARCHAR(50)
);
